#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int k=1;
    while(k)
    {
        int count=0;
        char p=0;
        char a[10],b[10];
    cin>>a>>b;
   if(strcmp(a,"0")==0 &&strcmp(b,"0")==0)
       k=0;
   else
    {
        int l;
      int x=strlen(a);
      int y=strlen(b);

      if(x>y)
        l=x;
      else{l=y;}

      for(int i=l-1;i>=0;i--)
      {
              int  sum=0;
        if(x!=0&&y!=0)
             { sum=p+a[x-1]+b[y-1]-'0'-'0';

                  if(sum>=10){count++;p=1;}
                  else
                    {p=0;}
                    x--;y--;
              }
        else
        {
              if(x==0)
              {
                  sum=p+b[y-1]-'0';
                  if(sum>=10)
                  {count++;p=1;}
                  else
                    {p=0;}
                  y--;
              }
              else
                { sum=p+a[x-1]-'0';
                  if(sum>=10)
                      {count++;p=1;}
                  else
                    { p=0;}
                    x--;
               }
          }

      }
      if(count==1)
      cout<<"1 carry operation.\n";
      else if(count==0)
        cout<<"No carry operation.\n";
        else  {cout<<count<<" carry operations.\n";}



     }
  }
return 0;
}
